overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "The Housepainter" (a.k.a. "Breakfast In Bed") — Hunky stud muscle-jock Roger as a housepainter in a 3-way. "Bigger Than Life" (a.k.a. "'Life' Session") — A young artist seduces his willing model, Roger. "Double Whammy" — Black stud Big Ben lures a clean-cut collegiate hunk back to his pad with promises of a big score. "Mr. Egan Gets His New Paperboy" (a.k.a. "Mr. Egan's Paperboy") — Jack Egan's newsboy arrives in a rainstorm soaked to the skin and Mr. Egan resolves to warm him up.
title: Double Whammy
